## useFrame() function

Creates a signal that is updated when the given effect is run.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useFrame(callback: RenderCallback, renderPriority?: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | [RenderCallback](./solid-three.rendercallback.md) | a function to run on every frame render |
|  renderPriority | number | priority of the callback decides its order in the frameloop, higher is earlier |

<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Example


```ts
const [count, setCount] = useSignal(0);
useFrame(() => {
 setCount(count + 1);
});
```
